# printerDestinations(for:)

**Instance Method**

Searches for a printer destination that matches the print-job attributes.

## Declaration

```swift
@MainActor func printerDestinations(for printInfo: UIPrintInfo) -> [UIPrinterDestination]
```

## Parameters

- **printInfo**: The characteristics of a print job.

## Return Value

A printer or printers that fulfill the printing options in `printInfo`.

## Discussion

This method inspects the [doc://com.apple.uikit/documentation/UIKit/UIPrintInfo] record to determine which printers to display to the user.
